title: Ukraine-L'armée de l'air dit avoir abattu 13 drones lancés par la Russie
cleaned_sentences: February 21 (Reuters) - Russia launched 19 drones and six missiles against Ukraine overnight Tuesday to Wednesday, said the Ukrainian Air Force, adding that Ukrainian air defense systems had destroyed 13 drones and a missile.
Some of the drones that have not been destroyed did not reach their target, said the Air Force on Telegram without providing more details.
Most of the 13 slaughtered drones were above regions close to the front line.
The Air Force also claimed to have destroyed a KH-59 cruise missile in the Poltava region, in the center of Ukraine.
The army said that Russia had launched five other missiles, without specifying if the missiles not having been destroyed had reached their target.
Reuters has not been able to verify this information independently.
(Written by Lidia Kelly in Melbourne; French version Camille Raynaud)
